attributes.title: Simple Integrity to Guru - Master is the Master Key
attributes.description:
In this Satsang (28 August 2019), His Divine Holiness Bhagavan Sri Nithyananda Paramashivam blesses the world with one of the most powerful Truths: have simple integrity to Guru; Master is the master Key. Why is this truth so powerful? Because he, the Guru, Paramashiva, will ensure anyone who declares their integrity to him will also experience that same space: samadhi, gratitude, awareness, integrity, love, faith, belief - Oneness. 

Meditation - Aum gan gan ganapataye namaha
